Rat Trap squeaks out of surprise, but then realizes that the body is lifele=
ss.  Heaving a sigh of relief, he takes a moment to scan the area, and snif=
f the air.  It wreaked of enemy signatures.  

"I don't like this..  Night =
Shift, we got definite Minion and Insecticon signatures all around this pla=
ce.  I got a feel'n that if we're gonna get Cheetor outa here, we're gonna =
need some backup."

He sends the feed back to Night Shift.

"Gotchya, woah,=
 you're right.  It might take more than just us ta get 'em outa here.  I'm =
gonna try'n connect with Rodimus but I'm not so sure we're in range."

He s=
tays in vehicle form, and tries his long range radio system, to contact Rod=
imus.

"Night Shift ta Rodimus, over.  Rat Trap and I are on a rescue missi=
on, ta find Cheetor, and now, we got multiple Minion and Decepticon signatu=
res runn'n rampant and there's only two of us here.  I can transmit our exa=
ct location right now, and hopefully you'll be able ta send some bots out h=
ere ta give us a hand.  Night Shift over 'n out."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogro=

> > The =
tiny rodent continues on his way. He keeps quiet and uses his nose and
> ea=
rs to direct him toward the source of the fire blasts. He hoped he could
> =
at least see if Cheetor was anywhere close by. But like everything else, it=

> would be a shot in the dark.

> <NEW>
> 
> As Rat Trap moved forward, =
using his small size and stealth he could easily
> discern the obvious sign=
atures of both Minion as well as the insectile
> creatures that they had fa=
ced before.
> 
> As he came though the last of the brush he could finally m=
ake out the scene!
> 
> All around were more bodies of offline insectile cr=
eatures as well as
> Insecticons, but in the air a battle was raging! There=
 were many duplicates
> of the deluxe Insecticons of Chop Shop, Ransack, Ba=
rrage and even Venom was
> flying through the air - all of them having a de=
finite minion energy
> signature. At the same time the insectile creatures =
were also present in
> large numbers, attacking these insecticon clones, it=
 looked as if a storm of
> mechanized insects were fighting back and forth.=

> 
> In the center of all of this two large figures were battling, one loo=
king
> like a large heavily armored wasp/mantid cross breed and the other l=
ooking
> like a powerful two headed dragon. Both of them moved around each =
other
> warily as they looked each other over. The dual headed dragon of co=
urse had
> the minion signature, while the other had the other was insectil=
e.
> 
> As Rat Trap was taking all of this in several Insecticons landed on=
 the
> ground beside him bursting the over hanging brush, one was a Ransack=
 clone,
> the other a barrage. However what was immediately obvious was tha=
t they were
> both offline, more victims of the battle above.
> 
> At the m=
oment there was no sign of Cheetor, but the battle is large enough
> that t=
hey could be in another section, or possibly not even here at all.
